availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James P. O'Briant (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Lucy O'Briant. Father of Frank O'Briant. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 815.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 219B.
"James P. O'Briant (1810-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial #63383977, accessed January 20, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/63383977.
